Title: Mukashi Keibanashi
Description: ['A fairytale and folklore parody anime focused on race horses. They take classic stories (like Momotarou or Cinderella) and put them in  race horse situations with the narrator voicing the action in typical fast-paced sports commentary. The anime is funded and promoted by the Japan Racing Association (JRA).']
Related: ['Alternative version: Jishin ga Kitarou Dousuru? Mushi Mushi Mura no Bousai Kunren']
